C2 a situation in which someone starts to deal with bad or illegal behaviour in a more severe way: There has been a series of government crackdowns on safety in factories.
More examplesFewer examplesThe police are having a crackdown on cyclists without lights.The company is having a crackdown on personal internet use.The school has started a crackdown on pupils who turn up late.
